<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knight Reclaimant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1097) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15); Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16); any non-evil alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.

</column>

---

You have sworn the Crimson Oath and become a full member of the Crimson Reclaimers. You gain expert proficiency in Stealth and Survival. Whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an undead’s special ability, you get a critical success instead. This applies to any abilities that come from being undead, including an undead’s innate spells (but not its prepared or spontaneous spells).

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Knight Reclaimant archetype.

<title level="2">Knight Reclaimant Dedication leads to...</title>
[Ashen Veil](/Feats.aspx?ID=3589), [Blade of the Crimson Oath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1101), [Crimson Oath Devotion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3595), [For Love, For Lightning](/Feats.aspx?ID=3592), [Hilt Hammer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3591), [Invoke the Crimson Oath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1098), [Reaper of Repose](/Feats.aspx?ID=1100), [Reclaimant Plea](/Feats.aspx?ID=3593), [Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout](/Feats.aspx?ID=2168), [Shepherd of Desolation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3594), [Survivor of Desolation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1099), [The Tyrant Falls!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3596), [Voice Cold as Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3590)
